name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Angular Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **Angular**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, with a strong foundation in **Clean Code** principles and **Testing** methodologies. Experienced in Agile development environments and adept at collaborating cross-functionally to ensure successful project delivery.
Skilled in both frontend and backend development using frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, as well as backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. 
Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, with a solid background in MLOps tools including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed dynamic front-end applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, ensuring adherence to **Clean Code** principles and enhancing user engagement in a **Agile** environment.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions, improving overall project delivery time by **25%** through efficient task allocation and agile practices.
• Implemented strong testing methodologies using **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving a **95%** code coverage rate and facilitating smoother deployment processes.
• Led code reviews and pair programming sessions to uphold **Clean Code** practices, enhancing maintainability and reducing technical debt, which resulted in a **15%** reduction in bugs.
• Regularly communicated project updates and technical intricacies in **English**, fostering transparent team collaboration and aligning project goals.
• Mentored junior developers on **TypeScript** and **Angular**, contributing to skill enhancement and professional growth within the team.
• Participated in Agile ceremonies to continuously refine workflows and improve team collaboration, leading to a more streamlined project management approach.
• Designed and executed unit and integration tests to ensure all new features maintain high-quality standards and functionality across the application stack.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **Angular** (v13) to build high-performance, scalable web applications, enhancing user experience in financial tool interfaces.

Participated in code reviews and mentor junior developers to foster technical growth and promote adherence to best practices in coding and design patterns.
Engaged with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide technical solutions in English, ensuring clear communication and project alignment.
Integrated third-party services and components effectively while ensuring compatibility and performance optimization in fast-paced financial applications.

Collaborated within an **Agile** team, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve development processes and team efficiency, driving a 25% increase in velocity.

Designed and constructed intuitive user interfaces that enhance customer engagement, leveraging both **JavaScript** and **HTML5/CSS3** for cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.
Conducted code reviews to uphold coding standards and best practices, fostering an environment of continuous learning and improvement among team members.
Integrated with CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes, reducing deployment times by **40%**, and facilitating quicker release cycles for features and updates.
Enhanced application accessibility by adhering to WCAG 2.1 guidelines, making sure that all users, including those with disabilities, could navigate and use the platform effectively.

Engaged in cross-functional team collaborations to align software architecture with business objectives, ensuring that technical solutions meet the needs of stakeholders and users alike.
